Common Questions About Baam

How is Baam different from an agency?

Traditional agencies charge $2,000-8,000/month, require meetings, and often expect you to provide ideas or approve everything. Baam runs independently‚Äîwe create, publish, and optimize without needing your time. You own all content, and there are no contracts.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes. Baam is month-to-month. If you cancel, you keep all the content we created (videos, articles, posts)‚Äîit‚Äôs yours forever.

Do you guarantee rankings or results?

No one can ethically guarantee specific rankings. What we do guarantee: consistent weekly work, accurate reporting, and best-practice optimization. Most clients see 50-70% visibility increases within 6 months.

What if I'm already working with an agency?

Baam works alongside other marketing. We focus on organic presence (Google, content, social), which complements paid ads or other services. Many clients use Baam to reduce ad spend over time.

How much of my time does this require?

Setup takes about 30-60 minutes (onboarding call + brief questionnaire). After that, zero hours per month. We handle everything.

What industries does Baam work best for?

Any local business where customers search online before choosing a provider. That includes healthcare, home services, restaurants, professional services, retail, and more.

Do I need to provide content or ideas?

No. We research your industry, competitors, and common customer questions, then create everything. If you want to provide ideas or topics, great‚Äîbut it‚Äôs not required.

How long until I see results?

Most businesses see measurable increases in visibility within 4-8 weeks. Significant call/visit increases typically occur in months 3-6 as content compounds.

Do I own the content you create?

Yes. Every video, article, and post is yours. If you cancel, you keep everything.

Can I see a live demo of the platform?

Yes. Click "Explore Live Demo Dashboard" to see exactly what clients see‚Äîreal data, real reporting, no fluff.
